short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a emoji select box to anilist text areas

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Anillist.co does not support unicode emojis by default, this extension adds an emoji select box to each anilist text areas of every page. Instead of inserting the unicode it adds the parsed html code that anilist undestands
